translations.translation: and those who outrun easily,
Then outpace the others swiftly
and vie with the others (in carrying out their Lord's behests);
by the angels who hasten along
And who quickly present themselves.
And by the racers, racing.
Then those who are foremost going ahead,
and those that outstrip suddenly
By the angels hastening,
by those that outstrip them suddenly,
And then they speed with foremost speed.
by those who, racing, take the lead,
Then press forward as in a race,
And by those that press forward as in a race (i.e. the angels or stars or the horses, etc.).
and the outstrippers (angels), outstripping,
And those who race swiftly.
And those who race each other in a race
[79:4] by those that race forward, [by] the angels who race forward to Paradise with the souls of believers;

(By the angels hastening) and He swears by the angels who hasten to Paradise with the souls of the believers and to the Fire with the souls of the disbelievers; it is also said this refers to the souls of the believers that hasten to Paradise,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: ويقالُ: هي السّفنُ { فَٱلسَّابِقَاتِ سَبْقاً } معناه الخَيلُ { فَٱلْمُدَبِّرَاتِ أَمْراً } معناه المَلائكةُ

translations.translation: It is said that the ships {the forerunners} refer to the horses {the organizers} refer to the angels.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَٱلسَّابِقَاتِ } أي: النفوس الفانية في الله
 الباقية ببقائه
 المبادرة إلى الخروج قبل نزول النازعات { سَبْقاً } [النازعات: 4] لكمال شوقهم وانبعاثهم
 وتجرُّدهم عن ملابس عالم الناسوت
 وانخلاعهم عن مقتضيات الطبيعة والأركان قبل حلول الأجل
 وهجوم المخرجات المخلِّصات

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ فالسابقاتِ سبقًا } فيسبقون بأرواح الكفرة إلى النار
 وبأرواح المؤمنين إلى الجنة
